page.title: 08Way of life in Bwlchysarnau
page.content: This is a very close-knit community with only 6 families having moved into the area since the 1970's(all English) Most of the families in this area are related to each other, sometimes several times over. Relations are very important to people and they are identified firstly by where they live and, secondly, by whom they married or whose cousin they are. Everyone knows all their obscure relatives, even as far removed as possible. Many marriages have taken place between the offspring of neighbouring farmers, even recently, although the search for education and employment is broadening peoples' horizons, along with the motor car. But even now most of the children tend to stay in the area as they grow up and settle down, although some have gone to university and then they tend to move away.
